channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-maya-flags (1.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to warn when using short names flags with Maya commands
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-typing-import-style (0.5)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ensure typing module import convention
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-annotations-complexity (0.0.6)
item.description: A flake8 extension that checks for type annotations complexity
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-rst-docparams (1.0.6)
item.description: Check for reStructuredText function parameter documentation
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flakehell (0.9)
item.description: Flake8 wrapper to make it nice and configurable
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-simplify (0.12)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks for code that can be simpified
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-blind-except (0.2)
item.description: A flake8 extension that checks for blind except: statements
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-spellcheck (0.23)
item.description: Spellcheck variables, comments and docstrings
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-dunder-all (0.1.5)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin and pre-commit hook which checks to ensure modules have defined '__all__'.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-annotations (2.5)
item.description: Flake8 Type Annotation Checks

item.title: Updated: flake8-aaa (0.11.1)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin that checks Python tests follow the Arrange-Act-Assert pattern

item.title: Updated: flake8-rst (0.8)
item.description: flake8 for code in rst files and docstrings

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-pep420 (1.0.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban PEP-420 implicit namespace packages.

item.title: Updated: flake8-fine-pytest (1)
item.description: A flake8 extension that checks test extra style

item.title: Updated: flake8-intsights (0.1.5)
